title: Man

properties.name: description
properties.value: Men are generic NPC civilians of RuneScape, particularly common in towns such as Lumbridge, Falador, among other settlements. They are also less commonly found outside of towns, and in remote places. Oddly enough, guards do not react to players killing these civilians.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:ManThe RuneScape Classic Wiki also has an article on: classicrsw:Man
This article is about the common NPC. For other uses, see Man (disambiguation).

Men are generic NPC civilians of RuneScape, particularly common in towns such as Lumbridge, Falador, among other settlements. They are also less commonly found outside of towns, and in remote places. Oddly enough, guards do not react to players killing these civilians.

Men can be pickpocketed by members at level 1 Thieving, yielding 8 experience points and 3 coins. They will often drop a herb when killed on members-only servers.

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Key (medium)(m)1Always[d 1]Not soldN/A

  1. The key is only dropped when completing a medium clue scroll asking the player to kill a Man.
  2. Looting bags are only dropped by those found in the Wilderness.
  3. The easy clue scroll drop rate increases to 1/121 with the completion of the easy combat achievements.

Cavalier man drops[edit | edit source]

The man with a cavalier, found in Jess' home in East Ardougne, does not appear to have any drops other than bones.

Drop rates estimated based on 22,262 kills from the Drop Rate Project, unless otherwise cited.

Man

A successful pickpocket attempt will gain the following loot:

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Coins3Always33

Date Changes
9 April 2015
(update)

The Musa Point man's "Attack" option was re-added.

30 March 2015
(update)

The Musa Point man's "Attack" option was removed.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • One of the black clothed men next to the Silk Stall in Al Kharid does not have a "Talk-to" option. This may be used to train Thieving by hiding NPCs attack options.

[[File:Man (Shayzien) chathead.png|left]] }} '''Men''' are generic [[Non-player character|NPC]] civilians of ''[[Old School RuneScape|RuneScape]]'', particularly common in towns such as [[Lumbridge]], [[Falador]], among other settlements. They are also less commonly found outside of towns, and in remote places. Oddly enough, [[guards]] do not react to players killing these civilians. Men can be pickpocketed by [[members]] at level 1 [[Thieving]], yielding 8 experience points and 3 [[coins]]. They will often drop a [[herb]] when killed on members-only servers. ==Locations== {{LocTableHead}} {{LocLine |name = Man |location = [[Al Kharid]] |levels = 2 |members = No |mapID = 0 |plane = 0
